Log.Message: Starting Fishing: The Mother of All Pancakes...

While.condition: not HasAtLeast(30438,&The_Mother_of_All_Pancakes;) and HasAtLeast(27590,1) and IsTimeBetween(0,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(818, 'Clear Skies') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(818, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clouds')

ExFish.condition: not HasAtLeast(30438,&The_Mother_of_All_Pancakes;) and HasAtLeast(27590,1) and IsTimeBetween(0,3) and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.IsWeatherInZone(818, 'Clear Skies') and ExBuddy.Helpers.SkywatcherPlugin.PredictWeatherInZone(818, TimeSpan.FromHours(-8), 'Clouds')
